name: The Dragon Tamer
credits:
Rita-B - ZHS translation
Rucodeby - RUS translation
description:
Adds a character called The Dragon Tamer, who fights together with his faithful dragon.

- Adds 75 cards and 12 relics.


v1.2.0 (2022-06-05)

Card Changes
- The keyword 'Channeling' was removed.
  - Deep Focus: Strength gain 6(8) -> 5(7), no longer cancelled. 
  - Stun Trap: Cost 0(0) -> 2(1), draw 2(4) -> 3(3), no longer cancelled. 
- Excess Footwork
  - Rework: The Rear gains 4(6) Dexterity.
- Build Up
  - Damage increased from 7(9) to 8(10).
- Punisher
  - Damage increased from 7(10) to 8(10).
- Overwhelm
  - Damage per Weak decreased from 3(5) to 3(4).

Others
- Light Shield now shows its cost correctly at the reward screen.
- Reticles around your characters appear more correctly.
- The power icon of Adaptation is now brighter.



For older patch notes, see: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/2301555870
